title: T3 Thomas #123 ad back for sale-SOLD

posts.post_title: T3 Thomas #123 ad back for sale-SOLD
posts.post_content:
One solitary crease and a stain on the back. No pinholes or other damage. $SOLD delivered. Please email to reserve. Check or money order only. Ed Hans P.O. Box 307 Buffalo, N.Y. 14207. [url]edhans@monkberry.com[/url] or (716) 876-6359 evenings and weekends are best, but call anytime and leave a message. Thank you.
